# Steps to reproduce

Show-Markdown .\CHANGELOG.md

Below is the content of CHANGELOG.md:
```markdown
# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/).

## [1.0.1] - 04-11-2018

### Changed

- README
  - Change import example UNC path from FQDN to NetBIOS.

## [1.0.0] - 04-11-2018

### Added

- Initial version.
```

# Expected behavior

Show the entire line

```none
[1.0.1] - 04-11-2018
```

# Actual behavior

Content after the first square bracket [ is cut

Instead of showing

```none
[1.0.1] - 04-11-2018
```

this is shown

```none
[
```

![changelog](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8019569/59982417-5cae1100-9612-11e9-9d95-e91034e1e052.png)
